Uses of Interface
org.matsim.contrib.common.stats.Discretizer

  • Packages that use Discretizer 
    Package Description
    org.matsim.contrib.common.stats  

    • Uses of Discretizer in org.matsim.contrib.common.stats

      Classes in org.matsim.contrib.common.stats that implement Discretizer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DiscretizerComposite
      A composition of two discretizers.
      class  DummyDiscretizer
      A dummy discretizer that returns just the input value.
      class  FixedBordersDiscretizer
      A discretizer with predefined bin borders.
      class  InterpolatingDiscretizer
      An InterpolatingDiscretizer is a discretizer with fixed borders so that a border lies in the middle between two neighbouring values.
      class  LinearDiscretizer
      A discretizer with bins of equal width.
      class  LinLogDiscretizer
      A composition of a linear and a log discretizer.
      class  LogDiscretizer
      A discretizer with logarithmically scaled bins.
      Methods in org.matsim.contrib.common.stats with parameters of type Discretizer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap Histogram.createHistogram(DescriptivePiStatistics stats, Discretizer discretizer, boolean reweight)
      Creates a histogram from the values in stats discretized with discretizer and weighted with the inverse of the samples' pi-values.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap Histogram.createHistogram(org.apache.commons.math.stat.descriptive.DescriptiveStatistics stats, Discretizer discretizer, boolean reweight)
      Creates a histogram from the values in stats discretized with discretizer.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap Histogram.createHistogram(double[] values, Discretizer discretizer, boolean reweight)
      Creates a histogram out of values discretized with discretizer.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap Histogram.createHistogram(double[] values, double[] weights, Discretizer discretizer, boolean reweight)
      Creates a histogram out of values discretized with discretizer and weighted with the values in weights.
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleDoubleHashMap Correlations.mean(double[] valuesX, double[] valuesY, Discretizer discretizer) 
      static gnu.trove.map.hash.TDoubleObjectHashMap<org.apache.commons.math.stat.descriptive.DescriptiveStatistics> Correlations.statistics(double[] valuesX, double[] valuesY, Discretizer discretizer) 
      Constructors in org.matsim.contrib.common.stats with parameters of type Discretizer 
      Constructor and Description
      DiscretizerComposite(Discretizer first, Discretizer second)
      Creates a new discretizer composite.
